info.title: Cowors API
info.description:
Cowors API Documentation

This API powers Cowors' workspace marketplace, including bookings, payments, wallet, and partner management.

banDuration.description: Duration of ban in days (permanent if not specified)

activeUsers.description: Active users in the last 30 days

uniqueUsers.description: Number of unique users who booked

firstTimeBookers.description: Number of users who made their first booking

verificationIds.description: Array of verification IDs to review

action.description: Action to perform on all verifications

notes.description: Optional notes for the bulk review

success.description: Whether the bulk operation was successful

summary.description: Summary statistics of the bulk operation

processedAt.description: Timestamp when the operation was processed

processedBy.description: ID of the admin who processed the bulk operation

property.description: The property/field that caused the validation error

message.example: email must be a valid email address

value.description: The invalid value that caused the error

message.example: The request could not be processed due to invalid input

errorCode.description: Application-specific error code for client handling

path.description: Request path that caused the error

provider.description: KYC provider to use for verification

bookingId.description: Booking ID if verification is for a specific booking

verificationUrl.description: Verification URL for user to complete KYC

rejectionReason.description: Reason for rejection if status is failed

metricName.description: Name of the metric being tracked

entityType.description: Type of entity this metric relates to

entityId.description: ID of the specific entity this metric relates to

date.description: Date for which this metric is recorded

targets.description: Goals and targets for this metric

description.description: Description or notes about this metric

isActive.description: Whether this metric is currently active

isPublic.description: Whether this metric is publicly visible

collectedAt.description: Timestamp when the data was collected

dataSource.description: Source system or process that generated this data

schemaVersion.description: Version of the data collection schema

message.example: Your booking has been confirmed for tomorrow at 10 AM.

Welcome to our platform

This is our story...

excerpt.example: A brief overview of our company and mission.
